translations: 次轻量级（拳击手）；分量很轻的人（或物）；不重要的人（或事物）

sentences.sentence: The other two members of the committee are just featherweight.
sentences.translation: 委员会的其他两个成员只是无足轻重的人。

sentences.sentence: You become free, featherweight and empowered to lead the life you were meant to!
sentences.translation: 你自由了，超然了，直奔向你想要的生活吧！

sentences.sentence: John is the other top featherweight. A win over him would propel him even closer to a fight against Lopez.
sentences.translation: 约翰是另外一位羽量级的顶级拳手，若是能够战胜此人，那么甘博阿与洛佩兹的比赛将会更进一步。
